update product
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tid = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hospital_id = #{hospitalId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, tid, hospital_id as hospitalId, city_id as cityId, type2, price, market_price as marketPrice, p_price as pPrice, type, online_pay as onlinePay, hospital_pay as hospitalPay, p_num as pNum, date_start as dateStart, is_fq as isFq, flag, date_end as dateEnd, total_num as totalNum, remain_num as remainNum, view_num as viewNum, sale_num as saleNum, online, img, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt from product order by id desc limit #{start}, #{pagesize}
